languages.text: "Наши силы занимают незначительные плацдармы на поверхности, однако не способны нанести эффективный удар по //ставке//оперативному штабу// богохульников в Машинном храме, в сердце мануфакторума Сигма-С-13. Именно там, по нашим сведениям, находится //архиеретик//объект для уничтожения//{g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}темный апостол{/g} Уралон Жестокий".

traits.locale_text: "Наши силы занимают незначительные плацдармы на поверхности, однако не способны нанести эффективный удар по //ставке//оперативному штабу// богохульников в Машинном храме, в сердце мануфакторума Сигма-С-13. Именно там, по нашим сведениям, находится //архиеретик//объект для уничтожения// {g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}Темный апостол{/g} Уралон Жестокий".

languages.text: "Our forces have secured minor footholds on the surface but are unable to deliver an effective blow to the //headquarters//operations centre// of the profaners in the Machine Cathedral at the heart of Manufactorum Sigma-S-13. According to the available data, it is the current location of the //arch-heretic//termination target// — the {g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}Dark Apostle{/g} Uralon the Cruel."
languages.original_text: "Наши силы занимают незначительные плацдармы на поверхности, однако не способны нанести эффективный удар по //ставке//оперативному штабу// богохульников в Машинном храме, в сердце мануфакторума Сигма-С-13. Именно там, по нашим сведениям, находится //архиеретик//объект для уничтожения//{g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}темный апостол{/g} Уралон Жестокий".

According to the available data, it is the current location of the //arch-heretic//termination target// — the {g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}Dark Apostle{/g} Uralon the Cruel."

languages.text: “我们的部队已经在地表区域建立了一系列小型据点，但无法攻破位于西格玛-S-13号制造工厂核心区域的机械大教堂，也无法对异端分子的总部//行动中心//进行有效打击。已有数据显示，机械大教堂也同样是//首席异端//终结目标//——{g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}黑暗使徒{/g}残暴者乌拉隆的所在位置。”
languages.original_text: "Our forces have secured minor footholds on the surface but are unable to deliver an effective blow to the //headquarters//operations centre// of the profaners in the Machine Cathedral at the heart of Manufactorum Sigma-S-13. According to the available data, it is the current location of the //arch-heretic//termination target// — the {g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}Dark Apostle{/g} Uralon the Cruel."

traits.locale_text: “我们的部队已经在地表区域建立了一系列小型据点，但无法攻破位于西格玛-S-13号制造工厂核心区域的机械大教堂，也无法对异端分子的总部//行动中心//进行有效打击。已有数据显示，机械大教堂也同样是//首席异端//终结目标//——{g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}黑暗使徒{/g}残暴者乌拉隆的所在位置。”

languages.text: « Nos troupes ont établi quelques têtes de pont à la surface, mais n'ont pas encore réussi à porter un coup conséquent au //quartier général//centre opérationnel// des profanateurs dans la Cathédrale de la Machine, au cœur du manufactorum Sigma-S-13. D'après les données disponibles, c'est là que se trouve actuellement //l'archi-hérétique//la cible à abattre// : l'{g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}Apôtre Noir{/g} Uralon le Cruel. »
languages.original_text: "Our forces have secured minor footholds on the surface but are unable to deliver an effective blow to the //headquarters//operations centre// of the profaners in the Machine Cathedral at the heart of Manufactorum Sigma-S-13. According to the available data, it is the current location of the //arch-heretic//termination target// — the {g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}Dark Apostle{/g} Uralon the Cruel."

traits.locale_text: « Nos troupes ont établi quelques têtes de pont à la surface, mais n'ont pas encore réussi à porter un coup conséquent au //quartier général//centre opérationnel// des profanateurs dans la Cathédrale de la Machine, au cœur du manufactorum Sigma-S-13. D'après les données disponibles, c'est là que se trouve actuellement //l'archi-hérétique//la cible à abattre// : l'{g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}Apôtre Noir{/g} Uralon le Cruel. »

languages.text: 「私たちの部隊は地表にわずかな足場を確保しましたが、聖工場シグマ-S-13の中心にある機械大聖堂にいる冒涜者の//本部//作戦本部//に有効な打撃を与えることができません。入手可能なデータによると、そこは//大異端者//抹殺目標//―― {g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}ダークアポスル{/g}、残酷なウラロンの現在地でもあります」
languages.original_text: "Our forces have secured minor footholds on the surface but are unable to deliver an effective blow to the //headquarters//operations centre// of the profaners in the Machine Cathedral at the heart of Manufactorum Sigma-S-13. According to the available data, it is the current location of the //arch-heretic//termination target// — the {g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}Dark Apostle{/g} Uralon the Cruel."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちの部隊は地表にわずかな足場を確保しましたが、聖工場シグマ-S-13の中心にある機械大聖堂にいる冒涜者の//本部//作戦本部//に有効な打撃を与えることができません。入手可能なデータによると、そこは//大異端者//抹殺目標//―― {g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}ダークアポスル{/g}、残酷なウラロンの現在地でもあります」

languages.text: «Nuestros efectivos se han hecho con ciertos puntos menores en la superficie, pero se ven incapaces de asestar un golpe decisivos en el //cuartel general//centro de operaciones// de los profanadores de la Catedral Máquina en pleno manufactorum Sigma-S-13. Según los datos disponibles, se trata del paradero del //archihereje//blanco a abatir//: el {g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}Apóstol Oscuro{/g} Uralon el Cruel».
languages.original_text: "Our forces have secured minor footholds on the surface but are unable to deliver an effective blow to the //headquarters//operations centre// of the profaners in the Machine Cathedral at the heart of Manufactorum Sigma-S-13. According to the available data, it is the current location of the //arch-heretic//termination target// — the {g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}Dark Apostle{/g} Uralon the Cruel."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestros efectivos se han hecho con ciertos puntos menores en la superficie, pero se ven incapaces de asestar un golpe decisivos en el //cuartel general//centro de operaciones// de los profanadores de la Catedral Máquina en pleno manufactorum Sigma-S-13. Según los datos disponibles, se trata del paradero del //archihereje//blanco a abatir//: el {g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}Apóstol Oscuro{/g} Uralon el Cruel».

languages.text: "Unsere Truppen haben kleine Stellungen auf der Oberfläche gesichert, können jedoch dem //Hauptquartier//Operationszentrum// der Blasphemisten in der Maschinenkathedrale im Herzen von Manufactorum Sigma-S-13 keinen effektiven Schlag versetzen. Laut verfügbaren Daten befindet sich dort aktuell //der Erz-Ketzer//das Terminierungsziel// — der {g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}Dunkle Apostel{/g} Uralon der Grausame."
languages.original_text: "Our forces have secured minor footholds on the surface but are unable to deliver an effective blow to the //headquarters//operations centre// of the profaners in the Machine Cathedral at the heart of Manufactorum Sigma-S-13. According to the available data, it is the current location of the //arch-heretic//termination target// — the {g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}Dark Apostle{/g} Uralon the Cruel."

traits.locale_text: "Unsere Truppen haben kleine Stellungen auf der Oberfläche gesichert, können jedoch dem //Hauptquartier//Operationszentrum// der Blasphemisten in der Maschinenkathedrale im Herzen von Manufactorum Sigma-S-13 keinen effektiven Schlag versetzen. Laut verfügbaren Daten befindet sich dort aktuell //der Erz-Ketzer//das Terminierungsziel// — der {g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}Dunkle Apostel{/g} Uralon der Grausame."

languages.text: "Kuvvetlerimiz, yüzeyde birkaç küçük kale ele geçirse de kâfirlerin Manufaktorum Sigma-S-13'ün kalbindeki Makine Katedrali'nde yer alan //karargâhına//harekât üssüne// ağır bir darbe indirmeyi başaramadı. Güncel verilere göre //başkâfir//yok edilecek hedef//, yani {g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}Kara Apotr{/g} Zalim Uralon şu anda orada bulunuyor."
languages.original_text: "Our forces have secured minor footholds on the surface but are unable to deliver an effective blow to the //headquarters//operations centre// of the profaners in the Machine Cathedral at the heart of Manufactorum Sigma-S-13. According to the available data, it is the current location of the //arch-heretic//termination target// — the {g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}Dark Apostle{/g} Uralon the Cruel."
